org.aion.api

Interface IWallet


  • public interface IWallet
    This interface is an interface for the class Wallet. Assists in account related interactions.
    Author:
    Jay Tseng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiMsg getAccounts()
      Retrieves a list of accounts currently available on the local node.
      ApiMsg getDefaultAccount()
      Returns the default account of the user latest set.
      ApiMsg getMinerAccount()
      Returns the default miner account of the backend.
      ApiMsg lockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc, java.lang.String passphrase)
      lock the desired account given the correct passphrase,
      ApiMsg setDefaultAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc)
      Set a defaultAccount in the client api instance.
      ApiMsg unlockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc, java.lang.String passphrase)
      Unlocks the desired account in 60 seconds given the correct passphrase,
      ApiMsg unlockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc, java.lang.String passphrase, int duration)
      Unlocks the desired account, given the correct passphrase, the user also sets the duration (milliseconds) in which the account stays unlocked.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccounts

        ApiMsg getAccounts()
        Retrieves a list of accounts currently available on the local node.
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class Address represent the public address of the return accounts wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • unlockAccount

        ApiMsg unlockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc,
                     java.lang.String passphrase)
        Unlocks the desired account in 60 seconds given the correct passphrase,
        Parameters:
        acc - the class Address represent the account address.
        passphrase - the class String represent the passphrase of the account.
        Returns:
        a Boolean indicating the success of the unlock wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through this method getObject.

      • unlockAccount

        ApiMsg unlockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc,
                     java.lang.String passphrase,
                     int duration)
        Unlocks the desired account, given the correct passphrase, the user also sets the duration (milliseconds) in which the account stays unlocked.
        Parameters:
        acc - the class Address represent the account address.
        passphrase - the class String represent the passphrase of the account.
        duration - the duration by int value that account stays unlocked (seconds).
        Returns:
        returns a Boolean indicating the success of the unlock wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getMinerAccount

        ApiMsg getMinerAccount()
        Returns the default miner account of the backend. miner account refers to the address utilized when isMining.
        Returns:
        the class Address represent the miner's account address of the connected Aion kernel wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • setDefaultAccount

        ApiMsg setDefaultAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc)
        Set a defaultAccount in the client api instance.
        Parameters:
        acc - the class Address represent the account address.
        Returns:
        a Boolean value indicating the success of account set wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through getObject.

      • getDefaultAccount

        ApiMsg getDefaultAccount()
        Returns the default account of the user latest set.
        Returns:
        the class Address represent the default account of the user latest set wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • lockAccount

        ApiMsg lockAccount(org.aion.base.type.Address acc,
                   java.lang.String passphrase)
        lock the desired account given the correct passphrase,
        Parameters:
        acc - the class Address represent the account address.
        passphrase - the class String represent the passphrase of the account.
        Returns:
        a Boolean indicating the success of the unlock wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through this method getObject.
